name: webinarRegistrants
description:
Zoom users with a [Webinar Plan](https://zoom.us/webinar) have access to creating and managing Webinars. Webinar allows a host to broadcast a Zoom meeting to up to 10,000 attendees. Scheduling a [Webinar with registration](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/204619915-Scheduling-a-Webinar-with-Registration) requires your registrants to complete a brief form before receiving the link to join the Webinar.
Use this API to list all the users that have registered for a webinar.

**Prerequisites:** * Pro or higher plan with a Webinar Add-on.
**Scopes:** `webinar:read:admin` `webinar:read`
**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `Medium`

webinarId.description: The webinar ID in "**long**" format(represented as int64 data type in JSON).

status.description:
The registrant status:
`pending` - Registrant's status is pending.
`approved` - Registrant's status is approved.
`denied` - Registrant's status is denied.

tracking_source_id.description: The tracking source ID for the registrants. Useful if you share the webinar registration page in multiple locations. See [Creating source tracking links for webinar registration](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360000315683-Creating-source-tracking-links-for-webinar-registration) for details.

page_size.description: The number of records returned within a single API call.

page_number.description:
**Deprecated** - This field has been deprecated and we will stop supporting it completely in a future release. Please use "next_page_token" for pagination instead of this field.

The page number of the current page in the returned records.

next_page_token.description: The next page token is used to paginate through large result sets. A next page token will be returned whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.

$ul: **next_page_token**: The next page token is used to paginate through large result sets. A next page token will be returned whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.
**page_count**: The number of pages returned for the request made.
**page_number**: **Deprecated**: This field has been deprecated. Please use the "next_page_token" field for pagination instead of this field. (default: 1)
**page_size**: The number of records returned with a single API call. (default: 30)
**total_records**: The total number of all the records available across pages.
